Other types of congenital diaphragmatic hernia, such as those affecting the central region of the diaphragm, or those in which the diaphragm muscle is absent with only a thin membrane in its place, are rare.",GHR,congenital diaphragmatic hernia
How many people are affected by congenital diaphragmatic hernia ?,"Congenital diaphragmatic hernia affects approximately 1 in 2,500 newborns.",GHR,congenital diaphragmatic hernia
